name: Create Device
description: Create a non-magical device. Requires gp.

name: Mathematics
description: Solve a complex mathematical problem or recieve a hint of how to solve the problem if it is a puzzle.

name: Construction
description: Create non-magical buildings. Requires gp.

name: Intuit Device
description: Learn how a device works and how to rebuild it.

name: Create Lesser Magical Device

name: Create Magical Device

name: Create Greater Magical Device

name: Create Master Magical Device

name: Gather Elements
description: Collect 1d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Advanced Gather Elements
description: Collect 2d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Expert Gather Elements
description: Collect 3d100 elements from the surrounding area. This roll may change based on the area you are in and is up to DM discression.

name: Chink In Armor

name: Lucky Break

name: Create Vehicle

name: Device Weapon Proficiency

name: Mechanus Patron
description: Follow the teachings and praise a god of engineering, metalworking, or crafting. A classic example is Vulcan. Sacrifice devices and resources to your patron to gain their favor and blessing.

name: City Planning
description: Become an expert at designing cities, their utilities, and infrastructure.

name: Modron Form
description: Transform yourself into part modron allowing you to add mechanical automated components onto your own body.

name: Modron Familiar
description: Convert an allied modron into a familiar.

name: Programming
description: Allows you to create devices and vehicles with complex instructions. Also allows you to program any programmable device with permissions.

name: Hacking
description: Allows you to hack into programmable devices, giving yourself permissions to program and change settings. Roll contested intelligence against the original programmer to hack the device.

name: Disarm Trap
description: Automatically disarm any trap that you have detected.

name: Identify Magical Device
description: Identify what a magical item is and how to use it.

name: Weapon Proficiency
description: Be able to use a weapon well, reduces thac0 by 1 when using the weapon. You may select one weapon category when taking this skill but you may take this skill multiple times to have multiple proficiencies. Write your weapon category instead of just weapon proficiency when taking this skill. Ex. Sword Proficiency.

name: Hey I Like That Guy
description: People generally enjoy your presence and have less suspicion towards you.

name: Unnoticeable
description: Allows you to sneak past enemies and prevent yourself from being detected.

name: Deception
description: Prevents people from reading your face and helps you hide the truth when lying.

name: Persuasion
description: Improves your ability to influence people to complete an action or give information.

name: Walk Like I Own The Place
description: Walk with authority, avoiding suspicion and reducing the chance that someone will question your presence.

name: Comprehend Languages
description: Understand any spoken language.

name: Pick Pocket
description: Steal an item from someone's pocket.

name: Master Pick Pocket
description: Steal an item from someone's pocket, hand, or even losely fit clothing.

name: Detect Trap
description: Detects a trap in the immediate area.

name: Detect Treasure

name: Pass Without Trace

name: Improved Ambush Initiative
description: Increase ambush initiative from 5 to 6.

name: Picklock
description: Allows you to pick open locks.

name: Backstab
description: Instantly kill any creature 100 health or below. If a creature is above 100 health, deal damage equal to the percentage rolled for backstab minus the reduce rogue skill percentage on your target. Improving this skill gives you an extra usage. Failing a backstab gives your target a free attack against you.

name: Incredible Luck
description: Become incredibly lucky on any action you attempt to do or event that happens to you. Maxes at 35%.

name: Use Magic Device
description: Ignore all nonphysical requirements for using any given item. Allows you to use scrolls, wands, and staffs without being a mage.

name: Long Backstab
description: Allows you to backstab with a ranged weapon. Improving this skill increases dex by 1 for this skill.

name: Diplomacy
description: Makes it easier to establish diplomatic relationships, truces, and treaties.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Be able to use any non-magical and non-combative skill.

name: Uncanny Dodge
description: Dodge an attack. Can be used any number of times in combat.

name: Chain Bacskstab
description: After making a successful backstab kill, make a backstab on a target who has not been backstabed by you this action.

name: Perfect Response
description: The DM tells you what they view to be a perfect solution to an immediate situation. This information does not have to consider to explain future actions.

name: Blindsense
description: You are able to hear anything moving around you and detect its position well enough to attack and dodge. Does not include projectiles.

name: Blindsense Expert
description: Allows you to sense projectiles with blindsense.

name: Forgo Rogue Skill Limit
description: Allows you to improve rogue skills by another 50%.

name: No Quick Death
description: If you are killed by a single attack or spell from full health, survive at 1 health. May be used once per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Elusive
description: Prevents attacks from gaining advantage on you unless you are restrained or incapacitated.

name: Miracle Saving Throw
description: Prevents taking any one-time damage even if it's impossible to avoid by normal means.

name: This Is The Way
description: Know the correct direction to travel inside of a building as long as you know your bearing. i.e. your direction on a compass.

name: Hint Please
description: Get a hint when solving a puzzle.

name: Redirect Focus
description: When being tagreted by an enemy attack, you may roll contested wisdom to redirect that attack towards a random friendly ally.

name: Death Curse
description: Enchant a creature with a spell that activates upon death. This spell will be directed towards the slayer of your target. Death curses only activate when the creature dies and is not instantly revived or healed.

name: Untargetable
description: You may not be targeted by enemy attacks until there are no remaining taregtable allies alive.

name: Commander
description: Increase the number of units you may easily control by 1 times your level. Improving this skill increases the multiplier by 1.

name: Rally
description: Increase the morale of allies in earshot by 5% for 1 combat rounds. Improving this skill increases the numer of rounds by 1 and the percent morale by 5.

name: Leadership
description: Increase the morale of allies under your command by 5%.

name: Mad Scientist
description: Dismembering a creature does not lower your alignment, this does not need to be rolled for. Also allows you to perform surgeries to attach severed parts of other creatures to minions and people.

name: Animal Friendship
description: Beasts under 6 intelligence will not attack you unless provoked.

name: Monster Friendship
description: Monsters under 6 intelligence will not attack you unless provoked or evil aligned

name: Plant Friendship
description: Plant under 6 intelligence will not attack you unless provoked.

name: Draconic Friendship
description: Dragons will not attack you unless provoked or evil aligned.

name: Beast Affinity
description: Pick a type of animal to become friends with. You may only take this skill once. Any animal of this type will automatically become an ally if they are below your level and have a chance of becoming an ally when above your level.

name: Monster Affinity
description: Pick a type of monster to become friends with. You may only take this skill once. Any monster of this type will automatically become an ally if they are below your level and have a chance of becoming an ally when above your level.

name: Draconic Affinity
description: Pick a type of dragon to become friends with. You may only take this skill once. Any dragon of this type will automatically become an ally if they are below your level and have a chance of becoming an ally when above your level.

name: Animal Trait
description: Gain a permenant trait from your affinity. If this trait is magical, the magical trait must be obtainable at your current level. Examples: eagle eyes, elefant ears, or dog nose.

name: Monster Trait
description: Gain a permenant trait from your affinity. If this trait is magical, the magical trait must be obtainable at your current level.

description: Gain a permenant trait from your affinity. If this trait is magical, the magical trait must be obtainable at your current level.

description: While in close combat with someone you may do a contested strength roll with advantage to knock them to the ground.

name: Dismount Fighter
description: While in close combat with a mounted opponent, you may roll a contested strength check with advantage to knock them to the ground.

name: Perfect Dual Wielding
description: Allows you to wield two weapons. at the same time. This does not increase the amount of times you may attack but allows you to use the effects from both weapons during one attack round.

name: Titanic Weapon Proficiency
description: Allows you to use very large and heavy weapons.

name: Whirlwind Attack
description: Spin around while holding a weapon to hit everyone around you. Whether or not you hit your targets is calculated as normal.

name: Gather Elements
description: Improves your foraging abilities.

name: Called Hit
description: Automatically hit a target anywhere you choose. This can still be dodged. You get one per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Called Crit
description: Automatically turn a hit into a crit. You get one called crit per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Taunt
description: Provoke all enemies that can see or hear you, focusing their attacks on you.

name: Giant's Strength
description: Gives you advantage on non offensive feats of strength.

name: Shield Bash
description: Allows attacking with a shield.

name: Just a Scratch
description: Gain advantage on constitution rolls when trying to resist pain.

name: Berserker Rage
description: Gain an extra round of attacks for this round but lose your action for next round.

name: Protector
description: Allows you to take the damage for someone within leaping range. You get one per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Spot
description: Allows you to see things far away.

name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
description: Gives you advantage on strength rolls when trying to run through something or someone.

name: Fearless
description: Gives you advantage on wisdom rolls when facing a terrifying foe.

description: Restore more health when rolling a crit on constitution if you're below half health.

name: Analyze Battlefield
description: Find strategic positions in the battlefield.

name: Forego Armor
description: This skill only works if you do not have any AC reducing or health increasing items in affect. Gives you an extra round of attacks if you get a crit. You get one extra round of attacks per level on this skill.

name: Distant Shot
description: Allows you to hit accurate shots as far as your weapon can reach.

name: Endurance
description: Gives you advantage on constitution rolls when doing any physical activity.

name: Deflection
description: Allows you to block or parry a projectile. You get one per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Manyshot
description: With a weapon that can be loaded with more than one of your ammunition types, fire multiple of that projectile in one shot. You may fire one additional projectile for every level on this skill.

name: Instant Reload
description: Instantly reload a gun.

name: Leadership
description: Inspire your companions with a speech. Those listening gain your charisma plus your level temporary health.

name: Commander
description: Gives you advantage on leadership and allows you to command twice as many people in combat (10 by default).

name: Improved Initiative
description: You gain +1 on combat initiative rolls.

name: Handle Animal
description: Gain advantage when wrestling with an animal.

name: Blind-Fighting
description: Allows you to fight opponents that you can hear but not necessarily see.

name: Shot on the Run
description: You do not suffer penalties from running while attempting a ranged attack.

name: Armored Fighting
description: Suffer no penalties for wearing armor and gain -1 ac automatically.

name: Reroll One or Two
description: On a thac0 roll, you may reroll any one or two.

name: Max Hit Die
description: You automatically gain the highest possible amount of health when leveling up.

name: Extra Hit Die
description: You may roll a second dice for health when leveling up. This dice is added to your first dice.

name: Bonus XP
description: Level up fast. This skill is only available to pure fighters with no other classes or access to other skill sheets.

name: Damage Reduction
description: This skill starts off at a 5% chance of success and increases by 5% each level. Reduces damage by the amount rolled on the dice on a successful roll.

name: Magic Resistance
description: This skill starts off at a 5% chance of success and increases by 5% per level. Ignore the affects of magic directly cast on you.

name: Create Undead
description: Use bones and body parts to create an undead creature.

name: Command Undead
description: Allows you to control twice as many undead creatures.

name: Musical Proficiency
description: Become good at playing any instrument or singing. Doing your selected task requires 1 less wisdom.

name: No Quick Death
description: If you are killed by a single attack or spell from full health, survive at 1 health. May be used once per encounter per level on this skill.

name: Infuse Soul
description: Infuse a captured soul into a minion to give it the abilities of the souls previous form.

name: Mad Scientist
description: Allows you to performs surgeries to attach severed parts of dead creatures onto your minions. Dismembering a creature does not lower your alignment.

name: Redirect Focus
description: Roll contested wisdom against someone attempting to target you for an attack. If you win, they may not attack you unless you're the only one left alive in your party.

name: Untargetable
description: You cannot be targeted until you are the only person left in your party.

name: Create Undead Golem
description: Combine a bunch of small undead creatures into a large undead creature.

name: Mathematics
description: You are good at doing math. Gain advantage when doing math in game.

name: Create Device
description: Create a machine using the scrap and parts that you have created. The price and time to build this device is determined by the DM.

name: Construction
description: Allows you to build buildings using gathering points.

name: Create Magical Device
description: Allows you to create a magical machine using gathering points and parts that you have as well as a magical item. The price in gathering points and time to create are determinedly the DM.

name: Intuit Device
description: Determine how a device or mechanism works.

name: Disarm Trap
description: Allows you to disarm a trap, if you fail the trap activates.

name: Identify Magical Item
description: Identify what a magical item is and how to use it.

name: Definition Return
description: Allows you to return a variable from a function.

name: Lucky Break
description: Allows you to reroll a crafting roll. You may use this skill once per craft per level on this skill.

name: Advanced Gathering Elements
description: Allows you to gather materials at a much greater rate, surpassing regular gather elements.

name: Create Trap
description: Rogue Skill. Allows you to create and arm a trap. Building requires materials or a premade trap.

name: Speed Assemble
description: Allows you to craft very fast especially in combat.

name: Speed Disassemble
description: Allows you to take apart creations very fast especially in combat.

name: Create Vehicle
description: Gives you the ability to craft a vehicle.

name: Demolition
description: Allows you to use explosives proficiently and safely.

name: Device Weapon Proficiency
description: If your device requires a thac0 roll to be used, reduce your thac0 by 1. Any magical device you create falls under this category.

name: Create Golem
description: Allows you to create a golem from materials or small creatures that you posses.

name: Mind Magic Resistance
description: This skill starts off at a 5% chance of success and increases by 5% per level. Ignore the affects of mind magic directly cast on you.

name: Wild Magic Resistance
description: This skill starts off at a 5% chance of success and increases by 5% per level. Ignore the affects of wild magic directly cast on you.

name: Necromancy Resistance
description: This skill starts off at a 5% chance of success and increases by 5% per level. Ignore the affects of necrotic magic directly cast on you.

name: Modron Familiar
description: Link your mains with a friendly and willing modron or robot, making it your familiar.

name: Lawful Planar Alliances
description: Lawfully aligned planes are generally more friendly towards you.

name: Mechanus Patron
description: A powerful being watches over you as your god. You may select your patron. Make sacrifices and pray to you patron to earn favor with them.

name: Design City
description: Allows you to plan city infrastructure.

name: Modron Form
description: Allows you to become part modron giving you resistance to mind, emotion, positive, and negative energy. You also gain resistance to cold, fire, and acid. You become weak to lightning.

name: Perfect Modron Form
description: Become a full modron. Gain immunity to mind, emotion, negative, and positive magic. resistance to fire, cold, and acid. You gain the ability to nearly instantly craft.

name: Swimming
description: You are good at swimming, gives you advantage while swimming.

name: Climbing
description: You are good at climbing, gain advantage when climbing.

name: Fairy Protocol
description: Know how to behave around fey and what to do when interacting with them.

name: Lower Planar Protocol
description: Know how to interact with people and things in a lower plane.

name: Upper Planar Protocol
description: Know how to interact with people and things in an upper plane.

name: Royal Protocol
description: Know how to interact with any royalty.

name: Native People's Protocol
description: Know how to interact when speaking to native people.

name: Woodland Ecology
description: You have knowledge of woodland creatures and plants.

name: Fairy Ecology
description: Know all about fey, their abilities, and where you can find them.

name: Monster Ecology
description: Know all about monsters and how to fight them.

name: Lightning Reflexes
description: Gives you advantage when using a reaction skill i.e. dodging.

name: Extra Slot
description: Each level gain an extra third of your mana per level. For example if you gain 9 mana per level, gain 12 mana per level instead.

name: Extra Skill
description: Gain an extra skill per level.

name: Improved Stat Crit
description: Lower the threshold to make a crit on a stat roll (not thac0)/

name: Improved Crit
description: Lower the threshold for getting a crit on that0 rolls.

name: Dragon Ecology
description: Know all about dragons and how to fight them.

name: Devastating Crit
description: Gain a +1 multiplier on a critical hit (default x2).

name: Penetrating Crit
description: Critical hits penetrate through solid objects more easily.

name: Two Spells Per Round
description: Allows you to cast two spells in one round if you can cast spells.

name: Sculpt Spells
description: Allows you to modify the shape of spells you cast without increasing the size. Ask the DM if you want to modify the spells in any other way.

name: Data Types
description: Allows you to use True, False, None, integers, floats, and characters in your REPL.

name: Mathematical Expressions
description: Allows you to use mathematical expressions in your REPL as well as any Math imports.

name: Boolean Operators
description: Allows you to use any boolean operators like and, or, and not.

name: Comparative Operators
description: Provides the REPL usage of <, >, <=, >=, ==, !=, is, and in.

name: Variables
description: Allows you to save data associated with a variable name.

name: For Loops
description: Allows you to create for loops and for each loops. You also gain access to the range() function.

name: Lists
description: Allows you to create lists containing multiple variables or objects. You also gain all list methods like len().

name: Strings
description: Allows you to create strings and save them to variables.

name: Loop Methods
description: Allows you to use break, continue, and pass inside of loops.

name: While Loops
description: Allows you to create while loops.

name: Import Variables
description: Allows you to access numbers or other variables known by you or a willing creature to be used in your code. Example, you can use self.health to use your health in your REPL.

name: Dictionaries
description: Allows you to create dictionaries and use methods associated with them.

name: Sets
description: Allows you to use sets and methods associated with them.

name: Definitions
description: Allows the interpreter to use def. only uses default return value of None. Max recursion depth 1000, if passed will throw error. Calling definitions costs the total number of lines in the function plus the cost of all functions called inside.

name: Functional Methods
description: Allows the interpreter to define filters as filter(function, iterable). Allows the interpreter to define maps as Map(function, iterable). Allows the interpreter to define temporary functions to be used in maps and filters.

name: Breath Weapon
description: Choose an element for your breath weapon. You breathe your element on your target up to 10ft away dealing 1d6 damage per your level per the level on this skill.

name: Claw, Claw, Bite
description: Scratch twice at your opponent then bite. Roll individually for each attack. This attack deals 1d6 times your level times the level of this skill.

name: 4 Actions Per Round
description: Take up to 4 actions per round. These extra actions cannot be multiple rounds attacks.

name: 3 Actions Per Round
description: Take up to 3 actions per round in combat. You may only make one round of attacks per round.

name: Infrared Vision
description: Allows the user to see infrared light and heat emissions.

name: Temperature Resistant
description: Take no side effects from being within -50C to 100C. Improving this skill increases this range by another 50C.

name: Algorithmic Mind
description: Allows the user to compute arithmetic at computer-like speeds.

name: Uncanny Initiative
description: Always take initiative unless your opponent also has uncanny initiative, then initiative is decided normally. Improving this skill also improves odds for ties on initiative.

name: See Full Light Spectrum
description: Allows the user to see all wavelength of light including radiation and radio waves.

name: 2 Actions Per Round
description: Take 2 actions per combat round, this cannot include another round of attacks.

name: Speed 1
description: Run up to 30mph.

name: Speed 2
description: Travel up to 100mph.

name: Speed 3
description: You can now travel the speed of sound.

name: Speed 4
description: Travel up to 120,000 mph.

name: Energy Propulsion
description: Channel energy into flight. The speed of the flight is influenced by speed skills and starts at 10mph.

name: Speed 5
description: Loop the Earth in 1 minute, 1.5 million mile per hour.

name: No Node Zone
description: Prevent other crystallites from creating energy nodes within 10 feet of you. This is a passive effect and always active.
